aboutContent: I am a professional IT consultant, I will discuss with you to understand your needs in order to design and develop user friendly website or application as you required. I will tailer make the application for you. If you required, I can also find the hosting service for you.
serviceContent: Website, Responsive Web application, Android mobile application, Windows application design and development with the competitive price. After several communications with you, you can leave the complicated programming tasks to me, and wait comfortably at home.
technologyContent: Different web framework will be used to fullfile your requirments. AI, big data, blockchain product are also provided.
contactContent: Please email me and tell me your project in mind, I will follow up. Email: anthony_717@hotmail.com
